column1: The CleverReach plugin will synchronize all subscriptions and orders with your account.
column2:
The CleverReach plugin will synchronize all subscriptions and orders with your account. Users can deactivate themselfs here and in CleverReach.
To synchronize old orders and subscribers, go to 'Newsletter -> Subscribers'.

Note: Manual un/subscribing in the the Magento administration backend wont be transmitted to CleverReach.

You dont have a CleverReach account yet? Signup for CleverReach now!

column1: This can be found on your Listsettings page in CleverReach.
column2: This can be found on your Listsettings page in CleverReach.

column1: Magento users who subscribe/unsubscribe to the newsletter will be added/removed from this CleverReach receiver list.
column2: Magento users who subscribe/unsubscribe to the newsletter will be added/removed from this CleverReach receiver list.

column1: Sync sales with CleverRech. Required for ordertracking. Note: this will currently NOT work with the Multishipping Checkout
column2: Sync sales with CleverRech. Required for ordertracking. Note: this will currently NOT work with the Multishipping Checkout

column1: Force registered and deactivated users to become activated aggain once they place an order. The flag 'Newsletter' will NOT be set for them.
column2: Force registered and deactivated users to become activated aggain once they place an order. The flag 'Newsletter' will NOT be set for them.

column1: If 'No' - then users who belong not to 'General' group, will have possibility subscribe to both, 'General' and '% Group' newsletter. If 'Yes' - just to '% Groups' newsletter
column2: If 'No' - then users who belong not to 'General' group, will have possibility subscribe to both, 'General' and '% Group' newsletter. If 'Yes' - just to '% Groups' newsletter

column1: You are currently subscribed to 'General Subscription'
column2: You are currently subscribed to 'General Subscription'

column1: Account confirmation is required. Please, check your email for the confirmation link. To resend the confirmation email please click here."
column2: Account confirmation is required. Please, check your email for the confirmation link. To resend the confirmation email please click here."

column2: There is already an account with this email address. If you are sure that it is your email address, click here to get your password and access your account."

column2: The Magento subscriberlist has been deactivated since deactivation will most likly happen in Cleverreach.
